channel.title: CVE Feed for Enphase -- Enphase Installer Toolkit
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Enphase -- Enphase Installer Toolkit

item.title: CVE-2023-32274|2024-08-02T15:10:24.324Z -- enphase -- enphase%20installer%20toolkit
item.description: Enphase Installer Toolkit versions 3.27.0 has hard coded credentials embedded in binary code in the Android application. An attacker can exploit this and gain access to sensitive information.
